subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Kevin Love is the athlete of the moment in Southern California, a 6-foot-10 freshman center leading the top-seeded U.C.L.A. Bruins into the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Kevin Love is the athlete of the moment in Southern California, a 6-foot-10 freshman center leading the top-seeded U.C.L.A. Bruins into the N.C.A.A. tournament.
